Should I buy some certificates

Project Management:
PMP, ITIL, Prince2, Msc
Security:
CISSP, CISA, GIAC, CEH
System/Server/Network:
MCSE, CCNA, Linux, OCA
Finance:
CFA, Msc
Coder:
Perhaps some from each of them + Specific languages

Find the

RIGHT Company

Small vs Big Company (Team)

  • I hate big companies
  • always do tiny mundane jobs
  • but they offer stable environment, and
  • exposure to big projects

Job Agency

Startups (in HK)

Government

Interesting Companies (to me)

  • Exciting and Useful products
  • Security
  • Startups
  • Charity Projects

* from Mark Curphey HITB keynote

Interview

Interesting Interview

  • Usual
  • Ridiculous
  • Interesting
  • Big Player’s Questions (e.g. Google)

Promote yourself

  • cover letter and resume
  • email
  • sit in the front row
  • talk to people
  • web presence
  • preparation for interview

What can you do

  • PLEASE, don’t over-pretend
  • Show what you can do
  • Show what you love to do
  • ASK what you can do in the company
  • ASK who are you going to work with

Cover Letters

  • Usually I have 2 templates
  • Write specific one to those I LOVE

Web Presence

  • Personal Website / Blog
  • Online Profile
  • Your Product
  • Open Source
  • Participated in Q & A
  • Write something about this sharing

You Personality Matters

  • eager to learn
  • like challenging things
  • make sense
  • problem-solving

Advises

Store your ideas

  • Paper
  • Notepad.exe
  • Evernote
  • Google Doc
  • Mobile

Sit in the front row

Say no

  • job offer or invalid job description
  • if you have a better way

I Believe in Agile

  • small iteration
  • retrospective / stoploss
  • achievable targets
  • fast to market
